page.title: 07Wormleighton - Stoneton
page.content: Stoneton was originally in the parish of Wormleighton, it then became a separate parish but is now back in Wormleighton. Stoneton Manor is next to a field containing the site of an old village but all that remains is the outline in the field. The farmer is not allowed to plough this area and uses it for grazing only. The Manor House had a moat but when the present tenants took it the moat was just a marshy area. By permission of the landlord the moat was restored and is now filled with water. This farm is not connected to either water or sewage and obtains its drinking water from the circular wells on land above Wormleighton Manor.
